A

actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class Client.ButtonHandler
The overriden actionPerformed class with parameters ActionEvent e, create the API message based on the button clicked and then sends it as a DatagramPacket to the Server class.
addIndex - Variable in class Client
The JTextField addIndex takes userinput for the index where the user wishes to insert an element into the linked list
addSubmitButton - Variable in class Client
The JButton addSubmitButton is the button the user clicks to submit their add request to the server class
addToHistory(String) - Method in class Client
The addToHistory() method appends a String s to the editHistory textArea object as a Runnable object to make a thread-safe GUI modification
addToHistory(String) - Method in class Server
The addToHistory defines a thread-sfae GUI modification to append a request sent or received by the server
addValue - Variable in class Client
The JTextField addValue takes userinput for the value that the user wishes to insert as an element into the linked list.
